amendment.description: Amendment establishes mandatory minimum sentences of discharge or dismissal, and confinement required for certain sex- related offenses committed by members of the Armed Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to establishe mandatory minimum sentences of discharge or dismissal, and confinement required for certain sexrelated offenses committed by members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Turner.
